passwordDescription: Change your password or recover your current one
socialDescription: You can link all your social networks with your weeZeel account so we can notify you whatever happens on them
socialBottom: We're currently working on adding more social networks, stay tuned
dataChanged: Your data has been changed successfully
passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully
retrievePassword: Please send us a mail to weezeel@weezeel.com asking us to retrieve your password. Thank you.
inviteTitle: Generate a weeKey for a friend to try out weeZeel
inviteExplanation: Be sure who you invite, you only have 1 invitation to use. Beware who uses your weeKey because if your friend gets banned you will also be responsible.
upgradePlans: In the future you'll be able to upgrade your account.
changeLanguage: Here you'll be able to change your account language.
changeDate: On this tab you will modify the date & hour you want to use.
changeWallpaper: Many wallpapers so you can decorate weeZeel as you like. You can also upload photos or use those which are on weeXplorer.
aboutError: weeZeel Team, who is weeZeel and what do we want.
